content.html: It's conference season again, so you may be preparing a talk with code snippets. Please remember -- MAKE THE FONT SIZE UNCOMFORTABLY LARGE FOR YOU Your audience will appreciate being able to read it. 👀 And... High contrast between background & text colors ◼️◻️🟨
content.value:
It's conference season again, so you may be preparing a talk with code snippets. Please remember --

MAKE THE FONT SIZE UNCOMFORTABLY LARGE FOR YOU

Your audience will appreciate being able to read it. 👀

And...

High contrast between background & text colors ◼️◻️🟨
